def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        ans += min(a[i], b[i])
        a[i+1] = max(0, a[i+1] - (b[i] - min(a[i], b[i])))
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        ans += min(a[i], b[i])
        ans += min(a[i+1], b[i]-min(a[i], b[i]))
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
